text: Azov Avia Airlines was a cargo airline based in Melitopol, Ukraine offering chartered flights using two Ilyushin Il-76MD aircraft. The airline was established and started operations in 1996, and ceased to exist in 2004.Azov Avia at airlineupdate.com ==References== Category:Defunct airlines of Ukraine Category:Airlines established in 1996 Category:Airlines disestablished in 2004 Category:Defunct cargo airlines Category:Cargo airlines of Ukraine
title: Azov Avia Airlines
